publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-286.2 Tommy Sheridan: First Minister's Question Time and Minor Standing Order Changesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-286) in the name of Iain Smith, insert at end "except that, in place of paragraph 1 of Annex A of the report, the Parliament agrees that in Rule 13.6.3 "40 minutes each week immediately following Question Time" be substituted for "20 minutes each week immediately following Question Time" and calls on the Procedures Committee to bring forward proposals so that Decision Time on Thursday normally begins at 5.30 pm."
